U

unacloud.pmallocators - package unacloud.pmallocators
In this package are located all allocator algorithms to assign executions to physical machines.
unacloud.task.queue - package unacloud.task.queue
In this package are located class to connect with queue to send messages to other projects.
unacloud.utils - package unacloud.utils
In this package are located all utility classes for this project.
